items.title: AT&T网站提及下一代配备M5芯片的iPad Pro (原标题: AT&T Website References Next-Generation iPad Pro With M5 Chip)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# AT&T网站泄露下一代iPad Pro信息

AT&T的网站在Google搜索结果中意外提及了一款未发布的、配备M5芯片的iPad Pro型号。目前尚不清楚这是否是一次意外泄露，或者仅仅是提前进行的搜索引擎优化（SEO）策略。

## 泄露详情

*   **HTML标题显示：** 在Google搜索结果中，AT&T网站上iPad页面的HTML标题显示为：“Shop Apple iPad Tablets: iPad Pro M5 Pre-Order Soon”。
*   **图片证据：**
    *   ![ipad pro 2024](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7rxyhqBCwKf7A_UN7EUtoGJebk8=/400x0/article-new/2024/05/ipad-pro-2024.jpg?lossy)
    *   ![ATT iPad Pro M5](https://images.macrumors.com/t/RaaH1FMMiTDCXMPf7hZaNfu5e84=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ATT-iPad-Pro-M5.jpg?lossy)

## 现状与意义

*   **产品列表：** 尽管AT&T的在线商店目前还没有M5芯片iPad Pro的产品列表，这使得此次发现并非实质性的产品发布。
*   **传闻印证：** 然而，这一信息与此前关于苹果即将发布下一代iPad Pro型号的传闻相符。
*   **发布预期：** 苹果预计最早将于本月更新iPad Pro，并为其配备M5芯片。
*   **早期泄露：** 该设备此前已在俄罗斯的两个早期开箱视频中泄露。
*   **传闻功能：** 曾有传闻称新设备将配备两个前置摄像头，但在开箱视频中没有发现此项改变的明显证据。
*   **设计方面：** 预计新一代iPad Pro不会有重大的设计变化。去年，iPad Pro更新了OLED显示屏并采用了更薄的设计。

## 相关背景信息

*   有传闻指出苹果可能在本月通过新闻稿发布多款新产品。
*   M5芯片预计将在2025-2026年期间逐步应用于Mac产品线。
items.shortSummary: AT&T网站在Google搜索结果中意外提及“iPad Pro M5”，暗示下一代iPad Pro将配备M5芯片。这可能是意外泄露或提前的SEO策略。尽管AT&T商店尚未上架，但此信息与苹果即将发布新iPad Pro的传闻吻合，预计本月更新。该设备此前已在开箱视频中泄露，但设计预计无重大变化。
items.translated_title: AT&T网站提及下一代配备M5芯片的iPad Pro
items.content:
AT&T's website references an unreleased iPad Pro model with an M5 chip, but it is unclear if it is an accidental leak, or simply a premature SEO play.


Here is how the HTML title for the iPad page on AT&T's website appears in Google search results:
Shop Apple iPad Tablets: iPad Pro M5 Pre-Order Soon
Here is a screenshot of the Google result:


The text might be changed quickly, now that it has received attention.

There are no product listings for an iPad Pro with an M5 chip on AT&T's online store, so this is ultimately not a substantial discovery. However, in line with rumors, it could signal that Apple is set to announce the next iPad Pro models soon.

Apple is expected to update the iPad Pro with an M5 chip as early as this month, and the entire device already leaked in two early unboxing videos out of Russia. It was also rumored that the device would be equipped with two front cameras, but there was no visible evidence of this change in the unboxing videos, so we shall see.

Last year, the iPad Pro was updated with an OLED display and a thinner design, but no major design changes are expected for the next models.

items.title: 苹果正在为iPhone准备iOS 26.0.2更新 (原标题: Apple Preparing iOS 26.0.2 Update for iPhones)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## iOS 26.0.2 更新概览

根据MacRumors的日志，苹果的软件工程师正在内部测试iOS 26.0.2。MacRumors日志一直是预测即将发布的iOS版本的可靠指标。

![iOS 26 Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EGeEJZAFMuH0j2ywenSgydx6r-w=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-Feature.jpg?lossy)

*   **更新目的**：iOS 26.0.2很可能是一个次要更新，旨在解决错误和/或安全漏洞。目前尚未公布具体细节。
*   **发布时间**：该更新预计将在未来几周内发布。

## iOS 26.0.1 修复内容回顾

上个月，苹果发布了iOS 26.0.1，其中包含了以下错误修复：

*   **Wi-Fi 和蓝牙连接问题**：iPhone 17、iPhone Air 和 iPhone 17 Pro 型号可能偶尔出现Wi-Fi和蓝牙断开连接的问题。
*   **蜂窝网络连接问题**：少数iPhone用户在更新到iOS 26后可能无法连接到蜂窝网络。
*   **照片伪影**：在特定光照条件下使用iPhone 17、iPhone Air 和 iPhone 17 Pro 型号拍摄的照片可能包含意外的伪影。
*   **应用图标显示异常**：添加自定义色调后，应用图标可能显示为空白。
*   **VoiceOver 禁用**：部分用户在更新到iOS 26后，VoiceOver功能可能被禁用。
*   **安全漏洞修复**：iOS 26.0.1还修补了一个安全漏洞。

## macOS 26.0.2 伴随更新

iOS 26.0.2的发布可能会伴随macOS 26.0.2。AppleInsider最近报道称，苹果一直在测试一款运行macOS 26.0.2的Mac新机型。该媒体认为，这款机型很可能是一款配备M5芯片的14英寸基础款MacBook Pro，预计将在配备M5 Pro和M5 Max芯片的高端14英寸和16英寸MacBook Pro机型之前发布。
items.shortSummary: 苹果正在内部测试iOS 26.0.2更新，预计将在未来几周内发布，主要用于修复错误和/或安全漏洞。此前，iOS 26.0.1已修复了包括Wi-Fi/蓝牙断开、蜂窝网络连接、照片伪影、应用图标显示异常和VoiceOver禁用等问题，并修补了安全漏洞。macOS 26.0.2也可能随之发布，并与一款新的M5芯片MacBook Pro型号相关。
items.content:
Apple's software engineers are internally testing iOS 26.0.2, according to MacRumors logs, which have been a reliable indicator of upcoming iOS versions.


iOS 26.0.2 will likely be a minor update that addresses bugs and/or security vulnerabilities, but we do not know any specific details yet.

The update will likely be released within the next few weeks.

Last month, Apple released iOS 26.0.1, which includes the following bug fixes:
- Wi-Fi and Bluetooth may occasionally disconnect on iPhone 17, iPhone Air, and iPhone 17 Pro models
- A small number of iPhone users may be unable to connect to a cellular network after updating to iOS 26
- Photos taken under certain lighting conditions with iPhone 17, iPhone Air, and iPhone 17 Pro models may include unexpected artifacts
- App icons may appear blank after adding a custom tint
- VoiceOver may become disabled for some users after updating to iOS 26
iOS 26.0.1 also patched a security vulnerability.

macOS 26.0.2


iOS 26.0.2 could be accompanied by macOS 26.0.2.

AppleInsider recently reported that Apple has been testing an upcoming Mac model running macOS 26.0.2. The publication believes this model is likely a base 14-inch MacBook Pro with an M5 chip, which is expected to be released before higher-end 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pro models with M5 Pro and M5 Max chips.

items.title: iPhone 18 Pro 已有传闻将搭载这 6 项新功能 (原标题: iPhone 18 Pro Already Rumored to Have These 6 New Features)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
尽管距离 iPhone 18 Pro 和 iPhone 18 Pro Max 的发布还有将近一年的时间，但关于这些设备的一些新功能和变化已开始流传。

![iPhone 17 Pro 颜色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kYrZtphKjIFb0w6sNk4f9n5fwbw=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iPhone-17-Pro-Colors.jpg?lossy)

### 主要传闻功能：

1.  **更小的灵动岛 (Dynamic Island)**
    *   据微博账号 Instant Digital 透露，标准版 iPhone 18、iPhone 18 Pro 和 iPhone 18 Pro Max 将配备略小的灵动岛。
    *   然而，这些设备不会采用屏下 Face ID，该功能预计要到 iPhone 19 Pro 或更晚的型号才会出现。
    *   此前关于 iPhone 17 Pro 型号将拥有更小灵动岛的传闻并未实现，但这一传闻再次出现在 iPhone 18 系列上，并且此次实现的可能性较大，因为它被视为迈向传闻中 20 周年全玻璃 iPhone 的一个垫脚石。
    *   Instant Digital 在微博上拥有约 150 万粉丝，曾准确泄露过未来苹果产品的信息，但其记录并非完美无缺。
    *   ![iPhone 14 Pro 灵动岛](https://images.macrumors.com/t/UDJpQcb_Qhn-ntf-sHOo2ymnbZE=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/iPhone-14-Pro-Dynamic-Island.jpg?lossy)

2.  **“半透明”MagSafe 区域**
    *   据拥有超过 300 万微博粉丝的爆料者 Digital Chat Station 称，iPhone 18 Pro 型号的整体设计将与 iPhone 17 Pro 型号相似。
    *   爆料者表示，这些设备将沿用 iPhone 17 Pro 型号的后置摄像头系统设计，即一个“平台”上呈三角形排列的三镜头。
    *   预计 iPhone 18 Pro 和 iPhone 18 Pro Max 将继续采用自 iPhone 16 Pro 和 iPhone 16 Pro Max 以来的 6.3 英寸和 6.9 英寸显示屏尺寸。
    *   值得注意的是，爆料者声称 iPhone 18 Pro 型号背面的陶瓷晶体护盾区域将采用“略微透明的设计”，但未详细说明。这可能意味着其外观将比 iPhone 17 Pro 型号更具磨砂感。
    *   ![iPhone 17 Pro USB-C 端口](https://images.macrumors.com/t/n6_bzGrRl6gpgUO9PejHZxy8RT8=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iPhone-17-Pro-USB-C-Port.jpg?lossy)

3.  **可变光圈**
    *   据供应链分析师郭明錤透露，两款 iPhone 18 Pro 型号的主 48 兆像素 Fusion 摄像头将提供可变光圈功能。
    *   可变光圈将允许用户控制通过摄像头镜头到达传感器的光量。
    *   从 iPhone 14 Pro 到 iPhone 17 Pro 型号的主摄像头都采用固定的 ƒ/1.78 光圈。
    *   这项功能将使用户能够手动改变光圈，从而更好地控制景深。
    *   考虑到 iPhone 图像传感器尺寸的限制，目前尚不清楚这项改进的实际意义有多大。
    *   ![iPhone 17 Pro 侧面轮廓](https://images.macrumors.com/t/zav0kEzW6G7-Rvjub2jF2QMvcjM=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iPhone-17-Pro-Side-Profile.jpg?lossy)

### 其他传闻：

*   **A20 Pro 芯片：** 采用台积电最新的 2 纳米工艺制造，有望带来显著的年度性能提升。
*   **C2 调制解调器：** 苹果定制设计的 C2 调制解调器，支持美国地区的毫米波 5G。
*   **重新设计的相机控制按钮：** 侧重于压敏控制，而非滑动手势。
items.shortSummary: 尽管距离发布还有近一年，iPhone 18 Pro 系列已有六项新功能传闻。主要包括：更小的灵动岛（但无屏下Face ID），背面陶瓷晶体护盾区域可能采用“半透明”设计，以及主摄像头将支持可变光圈。此外，还传闻将搭载采用台积电2纳米工艺的A20 Pro芯片、苹果定制的C2调制解调器（支持毫米波5G），以及一个重新设计的压敏相机控制按钮。这些变化旨在提升用户体验和设备性能。
items.translated_title: iPhone 18 Pro 已有传闻将搭载这 6 项新功能
items.content:
While the iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max are still nearly a year away, a handful of new features and changes have already been rumored for the devices.


Below, we have recapped some of the early iPhone 18 Pro rumors so far.

Smaller Dynamic Island


The standard iPhone 18, iPhone 18 Pro, and iPhone 18 Pro Max will be equipped with a slightly smaller Dynamic Island, but the devices will not feature under-screen Face ID, according to the Weibo account Instant Digital.


There were conflicting rumors about whether the iPhone 17 Pro models would have a smaller Dynamic Island, but its size did not change. Now, the rumor is back on the table for the iPhone 18 series, and there is a decent chance it will be true this time around, as it would be a stepping stone towards the rumored 20th-anniversary all-glass iPhone.

Under-screen Face ID, however, is no longer expected until the iPhone 19 Pro models or later.

Instant Digital has around 1.5 million followers on Weibo, a popular Chinese social media platform. The account has accurately leaked information about future Apple products in the past, such as the iPhone 17 Pro models featuring a vapor chamber cooling system, the Yellow finish for the iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Plus, and the Apple Watch Ultra 2's Titanium Milanese Loop. However, the account does not have a perfect track record, and some of the other iPhone 17 rumors it shared in recent months did not materialize.

'Translucent' MagSafe Area


Overall, the iPhone 18 Pro models will feature a similar design as the iPhone 17 Pro models, according to Digital Chat Station, a previously-accurate leaker with more than three million followers on Chinese social media platform Weibo.


The leaker said the devices will have the same rear camera system design as the iPhone 17 Pro models, with a "plateau" housing three lenses in a triangular arrangement. They also expect the iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max to have the same 6.3-inch and 6.9-inch display sizes used since the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max.

Notably, the leaker claimed that the Ceramic Shield area on the back of the iPhone 18 Pro models will feature a "slightly transparent design," without elaborating.

Perhaps this just means the Ceramic Shield cutout on the back of the iPhone 18 Pro models will have a more frosted appearance than it does on the iPhone 17 Pro models, but we will have to wait for additional rumors to surface for clarification.

Variable Aperture



The main 48-megapixel Fusion camera on both iPhone 18 Pro models will offer variable aperture, according to supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.

With variable aperture, users would be able to control the amount of light that passes through the camera's lens and reaches the sensor. The main cameras on all of the iPhone 14 Pro through iPhone 17 Pro models have a fixed aperture of ƒ/1.78, and the lens is always fully open and shooting with this widest aperture. With the iPhone 18 Pro models, users would be able to manually change the aperture, according to this rumor.

A variable aperture on iPhone 18 Pro models should provide users with greater control over depth of field, which refers to how sharp a subject appears in the foreground compared to the background. However, given that iPhones have smaller image sensors due to size constraints, it is unclear exactly how meaningful this improvement would be.

None of the iPhone 17 Pro cameras offer variable aperture.

Other Rumors


  • A20 Pro chip fabricated with TSMC's latest 2nm process, for more significant year-over-year performance improvements

  • Apple's custom-designed C2 modem, with mmWave 5G support in the United States

  • A redesigned Camera Control button, with a focus on pressure-sensitive controls, rather than swipe gestures
Read our iPhone 18 roundup for more information.

items.title: 苹果终止了针对初代AirPods Pro以及iPhone 12和12 Pro声音问题的服务计划 (原标题: Apple Ends Service Programs for Sound Issues on Original AirPods Pro and iPhone 12 and 12 Pro)
items.creator: Eric Slivka
items.summary:
# 苹果终止初代AirPods Pro及iPhone 12/12 Pro声音问题服务计划

苹果公司已正式终止两项针对初代AirPods Pro以及iPhone 12和12 Pro声音问题的服务计划，并将它们从其活跃服务计划列表中移除。

![AirPods Pro in case](https://images.macrumors.com/t/KWY0cJ9P3BUagWCtrne_ftBSOq8=/400x0/article-new/2021/01/airpods-pro-in-case.jpg?lossy)

## 初代AirPods Pro服务计划

*   **涵盖问题:** 针对初代AirPods Pro出现的爆裂声、静电声或主动降噪功能未按预期工作的问题。
*   **受影响设备:** 2020年10月之前生产的设备。
*   **服务内容:** 经苹果或苹果授权服务提供商测试确认问题后，可免费更换受影响的耳塞（左耳、右耳或双耳）。
*   **覆盖期限:** 从设备首次销售之日起三年。
*   **计划历史:**
    *   该服务计划于2020年10月启动，最初提供两年覆盖期。
    *   2021年10月，覆盖期延长至三年。

## iPhone 12和iPhone 12 Pro服务计划

*   **涵盖问题:** 针对iPhone 12和iPhone 12 Pro中可能出现故障的听筒模块组件，导致在拨打或接听电话时无声音的问题。
*   **受影响设备:** 2020年10月至2021年4月期间生产的设备。
*   **不包括型号:** iPhone 12 mini和iPhone 12 Pro Max不在此服务计划内。
*   **覆盖期限:** 从设备首次销售之日起三年。
*   **计划历史:**
    *   该iPhone服务计划于2021年8月启动，最初提供两年覆盖期。
    *   2022年8月，覆盖期延长至三年。

## 现状总结

由于两项服务计划均提供从设备首次销售之日起三年的覆盖期，绝大多数受影响的设备目前已超出保修范围，除非用户购买的是非常旧的库存产品。
items.shortSummary: 苹果已正式终止针对初代AirPods Pro声音问题和iPhone 12/12 Pro听筒故障的两项服务计划。初代AirPods Pro计划涵盖爆裂声、静电声或主动降噪异常，适用于2020年10月前生产的设备。iPhone 12/12 Pro计划针对听筒无声问题，适用于2020年10月至2021年4月生产的设备（不含mini和Pro Max）。两项计划均提供三年保修，因此大部分设备已过保。
items.translated_title: 苹果终止了针对初代AirPods Pro以及iPhone 12和12 Pro声音问题的服务计划
items.content:
Apple has officially ended two service programs that covered sound issues on the original AirPods Pro and on the iPhone 12 and ‌iPhone‌ 12 Pro, removing them from its list of active service programs.


In both cases, devices were covered for three years from their original date of sale, so the vast majority of units were already out of coverage unless someone managed to purchase from very old stock.

The AirPods Pro service program covered crackling or static sounds or Active Noise Cancellation not working as expected on the first-generation models, with affected units having been manufactured prior to October 2020. Under the program, Apple replaced affected earbuds (left, right, or both) after the issue was confirmed through testing by Apple or an Apple Authorized Service Provider.

The service program for AirPods Pro was launched in October 2020 with two years of coverage, with coverage extended to three years in October 2021.

The ‌iPhone‌ 12 and ‌iPhone‌ 12 Pro program covered a defective receiver module component that could fail, resulting in no sound being emitted when making or receiving calls. Affected units were manufactured between October 2020 and April 2021, and the iPhone 12 mini and iPhone 12 Pro Max were not included in the service program.

The ‌iPhone‌ service program was launched in August 2021 with two years of coverage, but coverage was extended to three years in August 2022.

items.title: 苹果Clips应用停用 (原标题: Apple's Clips App Discontinued)
items.creator: Eric Slivka
items.summary:
## 苹果Clips应用停用：详细摘要

2025年10月11日，苹果公司已实质性停用了其视频编辑应用Clips。该应用旨在帮助用户将视频片段、图像和照片与基于语音的标题、音乐、滤镜和图形相结合，以创建可在社交媒体上分享的增强视频。

![Clips应用上手图](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kH6z6rQbYz89sS6k7QorOe2yQus=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/clips-app-hands-on-thumb.jpg?lossy)

### 停用详情

*   **从App Store下架**：Clips应用已从App Store中移除。
*   **官方支持文件确认**：苹果官网上的支持文件指出，该应用已不再更新，并且从昨天起不再向新用户提供下载。
*   **现有用户影响**：
    *   已安装该应用的现有用户可以继续使用。
    *   现有用户仍可通过其Apple账户在App Store中重新下载该应用。
*   **新用户限制**：新用户现在无法获取该应用。
*   **视频保存指南**：苹果的支持文件还提供了如何将Clips视频和单个片段保存到用户照片库或其他位置的说明。

### Clips应用的历史

*   **发布时间**：Clips应用于2017年发布。
*   **早期更新**：在其早期，该应用进行了多次更新，增加了以下功能：
    *   支持Memoji和Animoji。
    *   支持LiDAR扫描仪以生成沉浸式AR空间。
    *   各种滤镜和图形选项。
*   **近期维护**：然而，在过去几年中，该应用除了偶尔的错误修复更新外，几乎没有收到其他更新。

items.content:
Apple has essentially discontinued Clips, its video-editing app designed to allow users to combine video clips, images, and photos with voice-based titles, music, filters, and graphics to create enhanced videos that can be shared on social media sites.


The app has been removed from the App Store, and a support document on Apple's site says that the app is no longer being updated and would no longer be available for download for new users as of yesterday.

Existing users who already have the app installed can continue to use it for now, and it can be redownloaded through your Apple account in the App Store, but new users are now unable to obtain the app.

Apple's support document also outlines how users can save Clips videos and individual clips to their photo library or other locations.

Clips was released in 2017 and was updated a number of times in its early years with features like Memoji and Animoji support, LiDAR Scanner support to generate immersive AR spaces, various filter and graphics options, and more, but over the past few years it hasn't received much more than an occasional bug-fix update.
